name: The Day of The Forgotten Ritual
name_original: The Day of The Forgotten Ritual
description:
When paranormal happenings becomes a daily occurrence, it becomes more of a chore than an event. An exorcism here, a ritual there...

It all becomes so mundane. So much, in fact, that it can event slip your mind, once in a while.

Just like now...

CONTROLS

WASD - Move

TAB - Objectives

LMB/E - Interact

RMB - Cancel Interact

PRESS X TO LOCK MOUSE if the game loses focus

Made for the Cosmic Horrors Jam

Assets and Tools

freesound.org - textures.com

Godot - GIMP - Blender - Audacity

Music

Vivaldi - Summer

Adam Janko - 2019.05.14.m

Art

Paintings - Fratvar  -  Twitter
